pages.title: Brown Hyena
pages.text: The brown hyena ($(o)Parahyaena brunnea$()), also called strandwolf, is a species of hyena found in Namibia, Botswana, western and southern Zimbabwe, southern Mozambique and South Africa.$(br2)It is the only extant species in the genus Parahyaena.$(br2)It is currently the rarest species of hyena.

pages.title: Brown Hyena
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rotten_flesh$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 4 Days
